entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning overnight. Fog patches. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
